title.rendered: GRAND WAILEA, A WALDORF ASTORIA RESORT, UNVEILS KILOLANI SPA

content.rendered:
Maui’s iconic Wailea resort opens its new spa, debuting a new era of wellness with premier treatments and time-honored Hawaiian rituals

MAUI, Hawaii, Feb. 29, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Maui’s iconic Grand Wailea, A Waldorf Astoria Resort, today announced the opening of its highly anticipated Kilolani Spa, an all-new open air luxury spa adorned by the natural beauty of Hawaii. At 50,000 square feet, Kilolani Spa will be the largest in the state and designed to preserve the heritage of the landmark hotel and honor local traditions.


Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/grand-wailea-a-waldorf-astoria-resort-unveils-kilolani-spa-302075000.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
